name: Monster Dodge
description:
In this game you must dodge the monsters falling from the sky by moving left or right. Last as long as you can! Don't get hit!

The controls:

  • Use the arrows(WASD as well) to move right or left.
  • Use the space bar for a dodge move.
  • Press R to restart the game at any time.

This was made by watching a Udemy course. Although I followed the course I plan to add things to it to make it my own. All of the sprites in the game were drawn by me. The audio/music was found on Freesound.org.
